title: Realtime request/response monitoring middleware for Koa, Koa2 and Express
author: cond289123
content: readme.md likitrealtime request/response monitoring middleware koa, koa2 expressinstallnpm likit@latest -skoaapp.(likit.koa({ app, port: 3001 // default}))koa2app.(likit.koa2({ app, port: 3001 // default}))expressapp.(likit.express({ app, port: 3001 // default}))
